hero.title: Esnaad Legal & Administrative Consultancy
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for legal excellence in the UAE

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We aspire to apply the law of the United Arab Emirates through our legal and administrative services and human resources and debt collection, by providing our full effort to serve customers with honesty and transparency to achieve the ultimate goal of returning rights to their owners, and applying the law in a way that protects the individual and society.

message.title: Our Message
message.content: We hope to provide all legal services perfectly by relying on our core values which are: diligence, commitment, responsiveness, strengthening trust and integrity, and reaching success that satisfies our customers in the future and preserves their legal rights.

footer.description: Founded in 2013, Esnaad is a distinctive law firm built on strong personal relationships and a commitment to high-quality, professional service. The firm represents a wide range of clients, including multinational companies, businesses, and individuals across the United Arab Emirates.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive legal and administrative solutions for your business needs

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We lead by example in all we do. We set the highest goals of honesty and ethics.

service.title: Service
service.description: Our work is handled timely and efficiently.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Our work reflects our best efforts, never less.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: You are our client. We work to achieve your business goals, we need to operate as a team.

achievements.title: Our Achievements
items: Increased use of computerized information systems
Improved performance awareness of human resources

history.title: Our History
history.description: Expanded experience and success in providing all services as required by UAE law

timeline.expandedDescription: Expanded experience and success in providing comprehensive legal services in accordance with UAE law, serving government, public, and private sectors.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about our story, our team, and why we are the right choice for your legal services

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Esnaad Legal & Administrative Consultancy was founded in 2013 by Dr. Iyad Ibrahim Al-Ghoul, with the aim of providing distinguished legal services that adhere to the highest standards of quality and professionalism.
ourStory.paragraph2: Since its establishment, the company has grown to become one of the distinguished law firms in the United Arab Emirates, expanding its experience and success in providing all required services in accordance with UAE law.

founder.name: Dr. Iyad Ibrahim Al-Ghoul
founder.description: A visionary leader with extensive academic and practical background in law and business administration, leading the Esnaad team with over a decade of experience in legal and administrative services.

credentials.lawyers: Elite group of lawyers and legal consultants
credentials.accredited: Accredited lawyers from UAE Bar Association

experienced.title: Experienced Legal Professionals
experienced.description: Our team consists of highly qualified lawyers with extensive experience in UAE law.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Legal Coverage
comprehensive.description: We handle all types of legal cases from administrative to commercial and criminal law.

confidentiality.title: Client Confidentiality Guaranteed
confidentiality.description: We maintain strict confidentiality and protect all client information.

transparent.title: Transparent Pricing & Processes
transparent.description: Clear pricing structure with no hidden costs and transparent legal processes.

proven.title: Proven Track Record
proven.description: High success rate in cases with satisfied clients across various sectors.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Services (Arabic/English)
bilingual.description: Fluent communication in both Arabic and English for diverse clients.

responsibility.title: Our Responsibility to Clients
responsibility.description: We pledge to maintain our customer service as embodied in law, and to maintain strict confidentiality which belongs to our customers and enhance confidence, because their goal is our goal. We strive to respond in all our work in a manner that guarantees the right resort to us in accordance with the law of the United Arab Emirates and to enforce it by all legal means before all courts.

cta.title: Ready to Work with Us?
cta.description: Contact us today and discover how our legal expertise can help protect your rights and achieve your goals.

step8.confidentialityText1: All information shared during consultation is strictly confidential and protected under attorney-client privilege.
step8.confidentialityText2: We guarantee complete discretion and professional handling of all sensitive information.

equalTreatment.background: We provide equal treatment regardless of background, nationality, or beliefs.
equalTreatment.professional: All consultations are conducted with the highest level of professionalism.
equalTreatment.cultural: We respect cultural differences and individual preferences.
